trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 렌더링에 수행할 음성 합성 Markup Language (SSML) 동작을 지정 된 주어진 <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 서비스에 대 한 요청을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: SSML 사양에서 요소를 정확 하 게 일치 동작과 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> 에서 반환 되는 텍스트에 구현 되며

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 TtsEngineAction 값은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 TtsEngineAction 값의 처리는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>속성에 의해 처리 됩니다는 음성 합성 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> 에서 파생 된 클래스에서 메서드에</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> 구현</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> 책갈피의 내용으로 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 `<mark>` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: SSML 입력에서 아무 작업도 확인에 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>는 알 수 없는 XML 태그는 SSML 표준의 일부가 아닌.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 이 입력 해석 되거나 합성 엔진이의 판단에 따라에서 무시 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: 입력 하는 요청 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> 텍스트 음소도 해석 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: 정확한 발음 지정는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>의 멤버는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>속성 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 `<Phoneme>` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> 텍스트가 포함 되지 않은 음성 렌더링 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: 여는 대기의 기간을 지정는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>he 소속 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>속성을 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>인스턴스.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 `<Silence>` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: 요청 하는 연결 된 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> 처리 하 고 말할 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: 이 TtsEngineAction에 대 한의 기본값은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>에 해당 하는 `<speak>` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 값에서 제공 되었음을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> 를 통해 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>속성은 개별 문자로 만드는.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: 이 렌더링 영숫자 텍스트 뿐만 아니라 공백 이외의 문장 부호를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 부분 "word"! 관련 된 다음 예를 들어

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: 에 synthsized 해야 "w o r d 느낌표"입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 단락의 상태를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
에 해당 하는 `

` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: 문장의 시작을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 `<s>` SSML 사양에서 XML 태그
